name: Is Anyone There? (Caerwyn Bartley, Duncans, Superior Jacob, KyraBenton, Elisabeth B, Alex Smits)
name_original: Is Anyone There? (Caerwyn Bartley, Duncans, Superior Jacob, KyraBenton, Elisabeth B, Alex Smits)
description:
"Is anyone there?" is heard over the radio as a light appears in the distance. 

They do not know where they are or who they are talking to, but they trust you to guide them to the safety of your watchtower. 

Your choices affect whether they survive, but something seems off.

Features full voice acting.

*Made as part of a 48 hour game jam*
